articles.title: Japanese Yen sticks to modest intraday gains against USD, lacks follow-through - FXStreet
articles.description: The Japanese Yen (JPY) weakened across the board on Tuesday after the Bank of Japan (BoJ) decided to maintain the status quo and stick to its ultra-loose monetary policy settings.
articles.content:
• The Japanese Yen ticks higher and snaps a three-day losing streak against the US Dollar.
  • Bets for early rate cuts by the Fed weigh on the USD and act as a headwind for USD/JPY.
